Title: Establishes distinctive "Alzheimer's Awareness" license plates and provides that the funding for such be deposited in the Alzheimer's disease assistance fund
Summary: Relates to establishing distinctive "Alzheimer's Awareness" license plates; provides that the funding for such be deposited in the "Alzheimer's disease assistance fund".
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; amd ยง89-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive "Alzheimer's Awareness" license plates; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to providing for further funding for the "Alzheimer's disease assistance fund"
